cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Smallest, best value car on the lot. Great car, fits 20-25 clowns
If you buy me lunch, I might just give you this piece of- I mean, this wonderful automobile
This car has a nice rust coloration. There is a stain in the backseat that looks like blood but is definitely not.
Great little ride that gets you from A to B efficiently.
